_comment_0: IDs are strings here. The loader converts them to ints. Keys starting with '_' are ignored.

guild._comment: The only guild this bot will operate in.

roles._comment_mod: Roles for moderation/tickets and admin gating.
roles._comment_autodelete: Whitelist roles allowed to message/react in autodelete channel without restriction.
roles._comment_tracking: Members with this role are excluded from activity tracking and weekly ranking.
roles._comment_autoDM: When a member gains watched role, they receive a DM.
roles._comment_gambling: Role granted by rare gambling wins.
roles._comment_rps: Role awarded when a user wins 5 rock-paper-scissors games in a row.

entries.message:
## Wanna partner?
DM an Owner/Admin if you meet these standards
 - Be a positive, active, and SFW community
 - Have a partnership or any other ping format to partner
 - Have more than 100 members (if not you won't get pinged here)
 - Be nice and friendly when asking :)

## Only use this channel if you have creator points!
> Use <@358598636436979713>'s `/profile` command if you have linked your account to the bot so we can give you the role.

> If you haven't linked your GD account to your Discord account, please use `/account link` in https://discord.com/channels/717003826288394271/717004813845659671 and follow the steps.
### If you react or send a random message here, you will be restricted from using this channel FOREVER

forum_first_message._comment_entries: Optional: multiple forum channels. If present, 'entries' overrides single forum_channel_id/templates.

default.title: Make sure your collab follows our format!
default.description: Your collab must have a name, theme, song, appeal, and purpose! This is **just a reminder**, so make sure to double check it for your collab to have more reach!

default.title: Make sure you ask for feedback correctly!

entries.message: Hi {user}, you got {role} in {guild}! Please contact staff through my DMs if this was a mistake. If you were muted as a punishment for an infraction, please ignore this.
Hi {user}, you have been marked as {role}, please contact staff through my DMs to verify you are not a bot.

gambling._comment_win_combo: If rare win triggers, final combo becomes this value.
gambling._comment_display: During spinning, the slot emoji is not shown. Final result is wrapped like: 🎰 🍒🍋🍇 🎰

help._comment: Help system settings for FAQs, appeals, reports, bot issues, weekly status, and transcript requests.

faq._comment: FAQ entries shown in DMs when user selects FAQ.
faq.title: FAQ
entries:
How do I request my level?
> Try to use https://discord.com/channels/717003826288394271/1120726649953062982/1286422838496067594, if it's closed it will let you know.

How do I partner with GD Avenue?
> DM an Owner/Admin if you follows our requirements found in https://discord.com/channels/717003826288394271/731145959043498116

How do weekly requests work?
> Be active during the week and the most active members get DMed on Sunday to claim their request

How do I contact mods?
> Use 'Mod contact' to open a private ticket in my selection menu, though only use this if needed

My level got send/rejected in level requests, what do I do now?
> If your level got rejected, try to take into account the feedback we give you. If it got accepted, we might contact you with more info, but know that your level is on its way to mods!

Where do I post/search for collabs?
> Use https://discord.com/channels/717003826288394271/1104487618026143754 and follow our guidelines!

help._comment_cooldowns: Help action cooldowns are enforced in code: appeal=48h, report_user=24h, bot_issue=6h, transcript=8h.

background._comment: Background telemetry and scheduled tasks. Safe to disable completely.

daily_summary._comment: Optional daily summary embed (Madrid time). If channel_id is empty, falls back to general_logging_channel_id.

status_rotation._comment: Optional rotating presence. Each entry is an object: {type,text}. Types: playing, watching, listening, competing.
